snippet: ISRAEL--Justin. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Justin Israel, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Justin's beloved wife, Emel Glicksman; his brother, Charles; his children, Johnny, Lynn and Jon, Diane and Lindsey, and Rob and Renee; his stepchildren, Cindy and Joseph, Sally and Nina; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: ISRAEL--Justin. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Justin Israel, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Justin's beloved wife, Emel Glicksman; his brother, Charles; his children, Johnny, Lynn and Jon, Diane and Lindsey, and Rob and Renee; his stepchildren, Cindy and Joseph, Sally and Nina; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
